# 女人怕什么

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/nvren-pashenme
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/nvren-pashenme
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install nvren-pashenme
nvren-pashenme <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g nvren-pashenme
nvren-pashenme <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
